channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: Busy families share how taking the time to pray together has revolutionized their lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch and Fr. Uwe Michael Lang discuss the most familiar form of Mass for Catholic?s today and the influences that have shaped this form marked by continuity and change. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saxum: Remembering Bishop Alvaro Del Portillo
channel.desc: The life of Bishop Alvaro del Portillo, the closest associate and successor of Opus Dei founder Saint Josemaria Escriva. Known for his fidelity to the Church and to his own vocation, the bishop was beatified in Madrid on September 27, 2014. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Gamer extraordinaire, Jonathan Blevins, aka ?BeardedBlevins? joins Fr. Mark at the SEEK/Focus conference in Salt Lake City to discuss the world of gaming and evangelization. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Cambodge, La Premiere Generation
channel.desc: Trois jeunes Cambodgiens qui ont vu leur vie transform?e par leur foi catholique. Cette ?mission, pr?sente la nouvelle g?n?ration de catholiques qui repr?sentent la renaissance de cette nation. Il y a des d?cennies le r?gime brutal de Pol Pot avait mis en place d?inf?mes champs de la mort, dont on ressent toujours la brutalit? dans l??me de ce pays d?Asie. Nos protagonistes sont t?moins de la renaissance et du renouveau que l??glise catholique apporte au Cambodge. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris Alar, M.I.C. helps viewers get a better understanding of the Divine Mercy message, and shares powerful, real life examples of people who live Divine Mercy in their every day lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Rhoda Wise
channel.desc: In Canton, Ohio, Rhoda Wise was well-known as a mystic with many spiritual gifts and healing miracles, one of them experienced by Rita Rizzo, the future Mother Angelica. Michael O?Neill relates her remarkable story. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about the source of biblical prophecy, how to know if God is speaking to you rather than self, and the New Jerusalem as a physical place. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catechesis: Communion With Jesus Christ
channel.desc: God's love begins with creation. The Sisters explain what is meant when we say that God is the Creator and the great mystery of His goodness. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Reading from Ephesians 4:2, Mother discusses that we should not only be charitable but tolerate those who are different. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Continuing with John Clark, hear the story of a young 19th Century Belgian woman whose experience of Christ?s wounds marks the divide between the ancient and modern stigmatists. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: EWTN Pro-Life Weekly is a half-hour news and commentary program that covers life issues including abortion, assisted suicide, in vitro fertilization, highlighting the mercy of a culture of life, from a Catholic perspective. This program features interviews, analysis, and actionable steps for viewers to defend the dignity of every human person from conception to natural death. Hosted by Abigail Galv?n. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Great Britain On Location
channel.desc: James McCullough interviews Sebastian Morello, a formation advisor with the Archdiocese of Southwark, discussing society's focus on the individual and the radical materialism that has eroded Christian faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: In Concert: 21st International Festival Of Sacred Music And Art Bach, Vivaldi & Handel
channel.desc: From the Basilica of Saint Mary Major in Rome, Dr. Jacqueline Leary-Warsaw hosts the sacred musical performance of Bach, Vivaldi, and Handel under the direction of Ildebrando Mura. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Bishop Fulton Sheen looks at the three main components of alcoholism: biological, psychological, and spiritual focusing mainly on the spiritual. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: Witness the stunning Eucharistic miracle that took place in Tixtla, Mexico, where human blood flowing from a consecrated host inspired awe and deepened belief in the Real Presence. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saxum: Remembering Bishop Alvaro Del Portillo
channel.desc: The life of Bishop Alvaro del Portillo, the closest associate and successor of Opus Dei founder Saint Josemaria Escriva. Known for his fidelity to the Church and to his own vocation, the bishop was beatified in Madrid on September 27, 2014. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Global Divine Mercy Chaplet
channel.desc: Children from around the world pray the Chaplet of Divine Mercy. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Way Of The Cross For Kids
channel.desc: Christine, Eva, Joseph and Enrique follow the 14 Stations of the Passion and Death of Our Lord Jesus Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch discusses a Middle Eastern King?s use of camels in battle and also looks at a shocking announcement in Isaiah 44 and 45 surrounding a Gentile, Jerusalem, and the Temple. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Discover the widespread issue of intra-family violence in Nicaragua and its broader implications across Central America, while uncovering the possible paths to resolution. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses that if your mind finds fruit in any point of your prayer, you should remain with that point and not go further. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Our Father's Plan
channel.desc: Jeff Cavins and Dr. Scott Hahn explore Maccabees 1 and 2, providing scholarly insight into the Maccabean revolt that restored traditional religious practices for the Jewish people. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Speed Skater Bonnie Blair joins host Bob Dolan to talk about her career, which included winning four gold Olympic medals and about her faith and her volunteer work for Catholic Relief Services. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: EWTN Pro-Life Weekly is a half-hour news and commentary program that covers life issues including abortion, assisted suicide, in vitro fertilization, highlighting the mercy of a culture of life, from a Catholic perspective. This program features interviews, analysis, and actionable steps for viewers to defend the dignity of every human person from conception to natural death. Hosted by Abigail Galv?n. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: When a convert to Catholicism awakens in the middle of the night to a television program, a pilgrimage to Lourdes ensues where he has a mysterious encounter with the Mother of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Fr. Christopher Seith is back to discuss the ways in which the Church, through faith in Christ, can rekindle a sense of wonder at the beauty of reality outside digital devices. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina explore the Biblical origins of the Papacy. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses that if your mind finds fruit in any point of your prayer, you should remain with that point and not go further. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Former NFL quarterback Elvis Grbac discusses his recommitment to Catholicism and involvement with the Church. Hosted by Marcus Grodi. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint Margaret Of Castello Seeing Through God?s Eyes
channel.desc: Few have faced the trials of St. Margaret of Castello, including blindness, physical disabilities and abandonment by her parents. But she overcame it all to minister to the sick and dying as a Third Order Dominican. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catechesis: Communion With Jesus Christ
channel.desc: The Sisters discuss God's providential love and how man?s happiness is found in participation with God?s creative work. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug discuss the theory of evolution, whether there are parameters for which Catholics can believe in this theory, and how unique transphysical souls play a part. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: John Clark concludes his discussion on the stigmata by examining the men and women of modern times who have borne the wounds of Christ, and suggests what we can learn from them. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Discover the widespread issue of intra-family violence in Nicaragua and its broader implications across Central America, while uncovering the possible paths to resolution. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stones And Pearls: The Rosary In The Holy Land
channel.desc: From the First Joyful Mystery of the rosary, the Creator of heaven and earth, the author of all visible and invisible things, of all living beings on Earth, one day came to dwell in the womb of a young Jewish woman. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Michael The Visitor
channel.desc: Narrated by Stockard Channing, this charming fable is an adaptation of Tolstoy?s classic tale about a lost young man with an amazing secret. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Massterpiece Donut Shop
channel.desc: Join Duncan and The Donut Repair Club is singing along with original songs about the heroes from the Bible featured on Massterpiece Donut Shoppe. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: St. Matthew was a different kind of tax collector ? he was a thief. Mother discusses his life and how Our Lord continues to reach out to poor sinners like him. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Wolf In Sheep?s Clothing
channel.desc: An expos? of the lies and deception spun by 60's radical, Saul Alinsky. His political tactics and theories espoused social justice, but carried an agenda that threatened core beliefs of Christianity and the Church. (90 minutes).
